Comments: Really good spirit. Well communicated and really well made calls. Thanks a lot.

Questioning calls rather than calling then. Generally a lot of unnecessary contact- such as a hand on arm to stop movement. Did not known where to be after a call discussion. Being quite arrogant and snide.
